# Draft:Battle of El-Fardan

Egypt
| combatant1        =  Israel
| commander1        =  Avraham Adan
| commander2        =  Hasan Abu Saâ€˜ada
}}
The Battle of El-Fardan also known as the Battle of Faradan was one of the Israeli counterattack battles that took place on October 8, 1973. The battle occurred east of Ismailia in the El-Fardan sector and ended with the defeat of the Israeli 217th Reserve Armored Brigade.
